broadwick.rng

Class RngException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • broadwick.rng.RngException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class RngException
extends RuntimeException
    A RuntimeException for random number generators.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RngException()
      Constructs a new RNG exception with null as its detail message.
      RngException(String msg)
      Constructs a new RNG exception with the specified detail message.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RngException

        public RngException()
        Constructs a new RNG exception with null as its detail message.

      • RngException

        public RngException(String msg)
        Constructs a new RNG exception with the specified detail message.
        Parameters:
        msg - the detail message. The detail message is saved for later retrieval by the Throwable.getMessage() method.
